text: ichiban boshi is my jurong point go-to food spot. whether i'm dining alone or with friends, it always hits the spot
Fresh and tasty 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 especially the beef I requested raw and underplate got a candle was the best 👍🏻 2 person $110 for this meal . 👍🏻

Ichiban Boshi is a Japanese restaurant located at Jurong Point. It is known for its fresh and delicious sushi, as well as its variety of other Japanese dishes.

Overall, Ichiban Boshi seems to be a popular and well-regarded Japanese restaurant. It is known for its fresh and delicious food, as well as its friendly service. If you are looking for a good Japanese restaurant in Jurong Point, Ichiban Boshi is a great option.

Ichiban Boshi@Jurong Point serves tasty and flavorful dishes with well-maintained standards. The service is great, making it a pleasant dining experience. Will definitely return for another meal!

2 🌟 - Below Average: Needs improvement in multiple areas, not meeting expectations.
3 🌟 - Standard, Average: Meets basic expectations, nothing exceptional but acceptable.
4 🌟 - Standard, Above Average: Exceeds expectations slightly, better than the norm.
5 🌟 - Special & Unique: Outstanding experience, highly memorable and exceptional.

I was the one queuing to make a payment first, but the cashier prioritized checking out their own staff instead. Is that reasonable? As a customer, I felt quite frustrated—but what could I do? I ended up having to wait behind them, and they took an incredibly long time to settle the bill. I don’t mind employees making purchases; I just hope they can prioritize customers first.
